articles.author: Chris Bumbaca
articles.title: Kirk Herbstreit defends 'Thursday Night Football' colleague Al Michaels against criticism
articles.description: Kirk Herbstreit, in his second year working with Al Michaels, 79, disputes the "narrative" regarding Michaels' enthusiasm during TNF broadcasts.
articles.content:
Don't bring that Al Michaels slander near Kirk Herbstreit.
The "Thursday Night Football" analyst came to his play-by-play partner's defense during an appearance on the "Pardon My Take" podcast that … [+2462 chars]
